channel.title: Squid on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Squid on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Using a squid cache to make automated data collection a bit less rude
item.description: squid is a web caching system. Instead of browsing directly to a site, you point your browser at a squid cache, and the cache serves up cached copies of the data you are asking for. If squid has an out of date copy of the data it fetches a new one for you. The goal is to be a transparent cache, and to be nearly as fast as direct access when you don't have the data, and way faster when you do.
